verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:14
verses.text: Doth not even nature itself teach you, that, if a man have long hair, it is a shame unto him?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:15
verses.text: But if a woman have long hair, it is a glory to her: for her hair is given her for a covering.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:16
verses.text: But if any man seem to be contentious, we have no such custom, neither the churches of God.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:17
verses.text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not, that ye come together not for the better, but for the worse.
